links.*: The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria
The Lord of the Rings Online
The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar

wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|October}}
Events that occurred on 24 October.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1944]]''' – [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] receives a letter from 12 year old John Barrow from [[wikipedia:Westtown Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania|West town, Pennsylvania]]. The boy has already read ''[[The Hobbit]]'' eleven times, and his use of the term "Gee Whiz" delights Tolkien. 
* '''[[1952]]''' - Tolkien writes [[Letter 135]].
* '''[[1955]]''' - Tolkien writes [[Letter 173]].
* '''[[1964]]''' - The third episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[1997]]''' - Voice actor [[Don Messick]] dies.
* '''[[2003]]''' - [[RingCon]] III in [[wikipedia:Tacoma, Washington|Tacoma, Washington]].
* '''[[2007]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]: [[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar|Shadows of Angmar]]'', "Prisoner of the Free Peoples" is released in North America.
* '''[[2010]]''' - New features are added to the 1994 online game ''[[The Two Towers MUD]]'', including a Facebook application.
* '''[[2017]]''' - [[Faith Faulconbridge]] dies
* '''[[2023]]''' - '''''[[The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria]]''''' released

==In Arda==
* {{FA|495}}:
** [[Tuor]], guided by [[Voronwë]], travels to [[Gondolin]] in order to deliver [[Ulmo]]'s message to [[Turgon]].
* {{TA|3018}}:
** [[Frodo Baggins]] awakes in [[Rivendell]], recovered from his wound, and meets [[Gandalf]].
** [[Elrond]] makes a feast where Frodo meets [[Glóin]]. [[Elladan]] and [[Elrohir]] return and talk to [[Aragorn]]. Evening at the [[Hall of Fire]] where Frodo meets [[Bilbo Baggins]].
** [[Boromir]] reaches Rivendell at night.<noinclude>[[Category:Dates|298]][[de:24. Oktober]][[fi:24. lokakuuta]]</noinclude>
